snippet: HYNES--Patrick J.,84, of New York, on May 22, 2016. Graduate of John Carroll '54 and Wharton '62. A retired US Army Captain, Pat was a computer consultant and an Associate Professor at Fordham University. Visitation Wednesday 4pm to 7:30pm at St. Paul the Apostle Church. Mass Thursday 10am. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HYNES--Patrick J.,84, of New York, on May 22, 2016. Graduate of John Carroll '54 and Wharton '62. A retired US Army Captain, Pat was a computer consultant and an Associate Professor at Fordham University. Visitation Wednesday 4pm to 7:30pm at St. Paul the Apostle Church. Mass Thursday 10am. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HYNES, PATRICK J.
